DESCRIPTION: Keep your healthiness high! The higher your healthiness, the more likely that positive effects will be applied, and vice versa.
Obtain ANY #yRed, #yGreen, #yBlue, #yPurple or #yColorless card. It costs 0 but #yPurges when used and at the end of your turn.
Junk consists of cheap and useful cards.
Weapons are valuable cards with attack-oriented effects.
At the start of each turn, lose 1 to 4 health randomly for each stack of this applied.

Shooting is a form of damage applied by certain ranged weapons. The damage per shot (A) is multiplied by the number of shots (B) with a Critical chance (C) and is displayed in (A x B, C) form. NL NL After each shot, shuffle an Empty Cartridge into your draw pile.
When attacked, negate damage equal to the amount of Peaceful you have.
Return this card to your hand whenever it is played. NL NL This card retains if it was not used this turn. NL NL The cost of this card cannot be reduced below 1.
Damage of this type cannot be Blocked.
